#Text=( (
#Text=WN ( Joseph Ford )
#Text=) )
#Text=Why did you make this film ?
#Text=Where did the inspiration for Shamelady come from ?
#Text=Eric Saussine :
#Text=In 1953 , Ian Fleming created James Bond and therefore the myth we all know .
#Text=In 2003 , for the fiftieth anniversary of the creation of Ian Fleming 's hero , I thought that it was time to pay tribute to this literary and cinema myth .
#Text=In September 2004 , I called his friend Pierre Rodiac , a former president a French James Bond fan club .
#Text=I talked to him about my idea to adapt Casino Royale , the only Ian Fleming James Bond novel that was not seriously adapted by Eon , holder of the movie rights .
#Text=Pierre was excited by the project and he started writing a synopsis .
#Text=We worked alternatively on it .
#Text=It gave way to a script which I wrote and Pierre corrected , that was a faithful adaptation of the novel , with all the trademarks of the movie franchise .
#Text=Then I immediately started the search for actors and locations .
#Text=On February 3 , 2005 , Eon Productions announced that Martin Campbell would direct the 21st film of the series .
#Text=The title was ...
#Text=Casino Royale !
#Text=I was happy because I had always wanted to see that .
#Text=I went back to work on my project .

#Text=I decided to preserve the general plot , change the names of the villains , the bad guy 's plan , a few scenes and re-introduced a well known terrorist organization and its chief from the Bond films and novels : S.P.E.C.T.R.E. and Ernst Stavro Blofeld .
#Text=I wrote a new script in a couple of months and found its title : Shamelady .
#Text=Pre-production started in 2004 .
#Text=Filming started in 2005 and went on in 2006 .
#Text=Post-production took place in 2007 and the release date was December 11 , 2007 .
#Text=( (
#Text=WN ( Joseph Ford )
#Text=) )
#Text=Last summer , you announced that Constellation Studios is at work on another Bond film , Shatterhand .
#Text=Tell us about it .
#Text=Eric Saussine :
#Text=Well , the team was so happy to do Shamelady .
#Text=At the end of this movie we were tired but response from the team members themselves that the first of them , Serge Rotelli ( Bond ) asked that we do another one .
#Text=Of course I had many ideas going wild in many directions in my mind .
#Text=So following that wave of enthusiasm I decided to renew the experience and launched the production of a new James Bond 007 adventure .
#Text=This time , the film will be our way to celebrate Ian Fleming 's hundredth birthday .

#Text=The plot will stay close to Fleming 's literary works and will be derived from the short story Octopussy , the last third of the novel You Only Live Twice , hence the title , Shatterhand , which is Blofeld 's pseudonym in that adventure .
#Text=The new film also includes an original ski chase in the pre-credit sequence and an explosive action finale .
#Text=Some shots were done for real in Japan .
#Text=We will probably miss the Fleming centenary in 2008 and will probably release it one year later .
